name: Naughty or Nice (itch) (Franny Dancis, FabCho, Zadira)
name_original: Naughty or Nice (itch) (Franny Dancis, FabCho, Zadira)
description:
Press Z to swing your bat! ESC to access the menu! Arrow keys to move! Walk over candy canes to heal! Collect 3 presents to win.

Made for the Winter 2020 Game Jam.
